    • Uses of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder that implement Builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MessagingBuilder
      Ogham provides many useful behaviors to focus on the message content and not the need of understanding and implementing complex protocols.

    • Uses of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env

      Subinterfaces of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ConverterBuilder<P>
      Builder that configures how conversions are applied.
      interface  EnvironmentBuilder<P>
      Builder that configures how configuration properties are handled.
      interface  PropertiesBuilder<P>
      Registers custom properties (see Properties).
      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env that implement Builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConverterBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  EnvironmentBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  PropertiesBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  SimpleConverterBuilder<P>
      A ConverterBuilder that builds the converter: If a custom converter is defined, use it If no custom converter, use DefaultConverter If DefaultConverter or custom converter that also implements ConverterRegistry, register all previously registered SupportingConverters
      class  SimpleEnvironmentBuilder<P>
      Builds the PropertyResolver: If a custom resolver is defined, use it directly If no custom resolver, use the JavaPropertiesResolver with merged Properties and converter instance provided by build()
      class  SimplePropertiesBuilder<P>
      A PropertiesBuilder that registers properties (key/value pairs) that is used by an EnvironmentBuilder.properties().

    • Uses of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype

      Subinterfaces of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>
      Builder that configures mimetype detection.
      interface  ReplaceMimetypeBuilder<P>
      Configures mimetype replacement.
      interface  TikaBuilder<P>
      Enable mimetype detection using Apache Tika.
      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype that implement Builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  ReplaceMimetypeBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>
      Builds a FallbackMimeTypeProvider: If SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika() has been called, then registers Tika as main mimetype detector If SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.defaultMimetype(String...) has been called, then registers a fallback to provide a default mimetype if none of the previously registered detectors could detect mimetype If no detector has been registered a BuildException is thrown (mimetype detection is required by many Ogham components If only one detector is registered, the FallbackMimeTypeProvider is not used and instead the alone detector is directly used
      class  SimpleReplaceMimetypeBuilder<P> 
      class  SimpleTikaBuilder<P>
      Instantites and configures the TikaProvider: If a custom Tika instance has been provided, then use it directly If no custom Tika instance has been provided, then use the default one: new Tika() (see TikaConfig.getDefaultConfig()) Tika may be in some conditions not enough accurate.
      class  TikaBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.

    • Uses of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.resolution

      class  AbstractSingleResolutionBuilder<MYSELF extends AbstractSingleResolutionBuilder<MYSELF,P>,P>
      Base implementation to handle lookup prefix configuration.
      class  ClassPathResolutionBuilder<P>
      Configure resource resolver that loads files from classpath.
      class  FileResolutionBuilder<P>
      Configure resource resolver that loads files from filesystem.
      class  StringResolutionBuilder<P>
      Configure lookup to use for direct string (when you provide directly the content of a file as string).

    • Uses of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder that implement Builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AttachImageBuilder
      Configures how attachment of images is handled.
      class  AttachmentHandlingBuilder
      Configures how Attachments are handled.
      class  AutofillEmailBuilder
      Configures how Ogham will add default values to the Email if some information is missing.
      class  AutofillSubjectBuilder
      Configures how to handle missing Email subject: if no subject is explicitly defined on the Email, Ogham will use the result of this builder configuration to provide a default subject.
      class  Base64InliningBuilder
      Configures how images defined in the HTML template are inlined (converted to base64).
      class  CidBuilder
      Configures how images are attached to Emails.
      class  CssHandlingBuilder
      CSS handling consists of defining how CSS are inlined in the email.
      class  CssInliningBuilder
      Configures how CSS are applied on HTML emails.
      class  EmailBuilder
      Configures how to send Email messages.
      class  ImageHandlingBuilder
      Image handling consists of defining how images are inlined in the email: Either inlining directly in the HTML content by enconding image into base64 string Or attaching the image to the email and referencing it using a Content-ID (CID) Or no inlining
      class  ImageInliningBuilder
      Configures how images declared in the HTML content are automatically transformed to make it work with email.
      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder with type parameters of type Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Builder<? extends MessageSender>>

      Registers and configures sender through a dedicated builder.

      Registers and configures a TemplateParser through a dedicated builder.

    • Uses of Builder in fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder that implement Builder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AutofillSmsBuilder
      Configures how Ogham will add default values to the Sms if some information is missing.
      class  PhoneNumbersBuilder
      Configures the phone number conversions (from a PhoneNumber to an AddressedPhoneNumber).
      class  RecipientNumberBuilder
      Configures the recipient phone number conversion (from a PhoneNumber to an AddressedPhoneNumber).
      class  RecipientNumberFormatBuilder
      Defines which standard conversions may be applied on the phone number to convert it from a PhoneNumber to an AddressedPhoneNumber.
      class  SenderNumberBuilder
      Configures the sender phone number conversion (from a PhoneNumber to an AddressedPhoneNumber).
      class  SenderNumberFormatBuilder
      Defines which standard conversions may be applied on the phone number to convert it from a PhoneNumber to an AddressedPhoneNumber.
      class  SmsBuilder
      Configures how to send Sms messages.
